mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM qrcode_rel WHERE open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.open_id, qrcode_id, user_id, login_time, order_id, pay_time, r.create_time,r.update_time, r.type,promotion_name,doctor_id,order_code,order_name,order_price,u.name as doctor_name,a.name as user_name FROM qrcode_rel r left join backstage_user_info u on u.manager_id =r.doctor_id left join api_user_info a on a.manager_id = r.user_id WHERE 1=1 and r.type ='2' and a.in_use=1
and DATE_FORMAT(login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{registStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{registEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{payStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{payEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and u.name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and promotion_name = #{promotionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.open_id, qrcode_id, user_id, login_time, order_id, pay_time, r.create_time,r.update_time, r.type,promotion_name,doctor_id,order_code,order_name,order_price,u.name as doctor_name,a.name as user_name FROM qrcode_rel r left join backstage_user_info u on u.manager_id =r.doctor_id left join api_user_info a on a.manager_id = r.user_id WHERE 1=1 and r.type ='2' and a.in_use=1
and DATE_FORMAT(login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{registStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{registEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{payStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{payEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and u.name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and promotion_name = #{promotionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
